name: jenkins_api_client
short_description: This project is a simple API client for interacting with Jenkins Continuous Integration server. Jenkins provides three kinds of remote access API. 1. XML API, 2. JSON API, and 3. Python API. This project aims at consuming the JSON API and provides some useful functions for controlling jobs on the Jenkins programatically. Even though Jenkins provides an awesome UI for controlling jobs, it would be nice and helpful to have a programmable interface so we can dynamically and automatically manage jobs and other artifacts.
summary: Client libraries for communicating with a Jenkins CI server
